snippet: The Frederick County Council voted 6 to 1 against placing a fishing retreat on a local register of historic places, making it unlikely that a drug rehabilitation program with ties to the Church of Scientology will be opened.
abstract: Frederick County Council in Maryland rejects effort to put fishing retreat known as Trout Run on register of historic places in area, which paves way for drug rehabilitation center tied to Church of Scientology to be constructed on site.
lead_paragraph: The Frederick County Council voted 6 to 1 against placing a fishing retreat on a local register of historic places, making it unlikely that a drug rehabilitation program with ties to the Church of Scientology will be opened.

headline.main: Maryland: Vote Is a Setback for Scientology-Linked Rehab Center
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Vote Is a Setback for Scientology-Linked Rehab Center
